item.title: 服务业降温，美国商业活动趋缓
item.description: 受服务业拖累，本月美国商业活动增速为 2023 年 9 月以来最慢。【原文：US business activity expanded this month at the slowest pace since September 2023, dragged down by the service sector.】

item.title: 新世界预计减值费用将导致上半年亏损
item.description: 亿万富豪郑氏家族旗下的香港房地产开发商新世界发展有限公司预计，由于房地产市场长期低迷导致的减值费用，该公司本财年上半年的持续经营业务将出现净亏损。【原文：New World Development Co., the Hong Kong property developer owned by the billionaire Cheng family, expects to post a net loss from continuing operations in the first half of the fiscal year due to impairment charges following an extended real estate slump.】

item.title: 特朗普欲以关税对抗被大科技公司鄙视的数字税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普预计将于周五签署一份备忘录，针对一些国家对美国科技巨头征收的数字服务税敞开征税大门。【原文：President Donald Trump is expected to sign a memorandum Friday that opens the door to levies in response to digital services taxes some countries impose on US tech giants, people familiar with the plans said, the latest step to expand a tariff war aimed at addressing imbalances in global trade.】

item.title: OpenAI 封禁看似在开发监控工具的账户
item.description:
这家人工智能初创公司表示，这些账户很可能与中国有关。【原文：

The AI startup said the accounts were likely linked to China.

】

item.title: 据说肯尼亚下周将获得阿联酋 15 亿美元贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，肯尼亚预计将在下周末收到阿拉伯联合酋长国提供的 15 亿美元贷款。【原文：Kenya expects to receive a $1.5 billion loan from the United Arab Emirates by the end of next week, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: FCA 称内幕交易由英国政府 Covid 贷款资助
item.description: 周五，伦敦的一个陪审团被告知，一名被控从事内幕交易的私人教练利用旨在帮助企业渡过大流行病难关的 Covid-19 贷款为其合作伙伴的交易账户提供资金。【原文：A personal trainer accused of insider dealing funded his partner’s trading account using a Covid-19 loan designed to help businesses survive the pandemic, a London jury was told on Friday.】

item.title: 司法部和美国证券交易委员会调查 CrowdStrike 与 Carahsoft 的 3200 万美元交易
item.description: 据两位熟悉此事的人士和彭博新闻社看到的一份文件称，美国检察官和监管机构正在调查 CrowdStrike Holdings Inc.【原文：US prosecutors and regulators are investigating a $32 million deal between CrowdStrike Holdings Inc. and a technology distributor to provide cybersecurity tools to the Internal Revenue Service, according to two people familiar with the matter and a document seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 经济学家调查认为美国通胀走高，美联储稍后降息
item.description: 经济学家们认为，美联储偏好的通胀指标在短期内会以更快的速度上升，从而促使政策制定者在更长的时间内维持高利率。【原文：Economists see the Federal Reserve’s preferred inflation metric rising at a brisker pace in the near term, prompting policymakers to keep interest rates elevated for longer.】

item.title: 法官称梵蒂冈在房产交易中被金融家 "辜负
item.description: 伦敦一名法官裁定，梵蒂冈在购买伦敦一处豪华房产的问题上被一名金融家 "彻底辜负"，导致梵蒂冈面临超过 1 亿欧元（1.05 亿美元）的损失。【原文：The Vatican was “utterly let down” by a financier over the purchase of a luxury London property that left the city state facing more than €100 million ($105 million) in losses, a London judge ruled.】

item.title: 防务竞赛让欧洲军火制造商创 16 个月来最佳业绩
item.description: 欧洲国防股即将迎来 16 个月来表现最好的一周，因为该地区将大规模增加开支以支持乌克兰。【原文：European defense stocks are on the cusp of closing out their best week in 16 months on a bet that the region is about to massively ramp up spending in support of Ukraine.】

item.title: 需求担忧盖过供应紧张，可可下跌
item.description: 可可价格创下历史新高后，市场担心需求减弱，纽约市场可可价格下跌，并将出现单周下跌。【原文：Cocoa dropped in New York, heading for a weekly decline, amid concerns about weaker demand in the wake of record prices.】

item.title: 加拿大 1 月零售销售额在年末大涨后出现下滑
item.description: 加拿大消费者在节假日大肆挥霍之后，收紧了荷包。【原文：Canadian consumers tightened their grip on their purse strings after a holiday splurge.】

item.title: 中国在与贝森特的首次通话中对美国关税表示担忧
item.description: 中国国务院副总理何立峰在唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫后与美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特的首次通话中表达了对美国新关税的 "严重关切"，世界上最大的两个经济体重启了高层沟通渠道。【原文：Chinese Vice Premier He Lifeng expressed “serious concern” over new US tariffs in his first call with US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent since Donald Trump returned to the White House, as the world’s two largest economies restart a high-level channel for communication.】

item.title: 会议记录显示，印度利率制定者对限制性政策感到担忧
item.description: 印度央行利率制定小组周五的会议记录显示，印度决策者对过度限制性的货币政策打击经济增长表示担忧，这促使他们降低了借贷成本。【原文：India’s policymakers expressed concerns over economic growth getting hit by an excessively restrictive monetary policy, which led them to make a reduction in borrowing cost, minutes of the central bank’s rate-setting panel showed Friday.】

item.title: 据说阿波罗正在酝酿从沙特人手中收购西班牙 Fotowatio 公司
item.description: 据知情人士透露，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. is among suitors looking to buy Spain’s Fotowatio Renewable Ventures from its Saudi parent company, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Coinbase 称美国证券交易委员会即将撤销执法案件
item.description: Coinbase Global Inc.表示，美国证券交易委员会已同意撤销指控这家美国最大加密货币交易平台经营非法交易所的诉讼。该协议有待委员会批准。【原文：Coinbase Global Inc. said the Securities and Exchange Commission has agreed to drop its lawsuit that accused the largest US cryptocurrency trading platform of running an illegal exchange. The agreement is pending commissioner approval.】

item.title: 华尔街正在销售模仿私募股权投资热潮的 ETF
item.description: 华尔街仍在等待监管机构批准首批全面的私募资产 ETF，但目前机会主义发行商仍在不断推出声称复制这一蓬勃发展的资产类别的产品，并不断扩展 "流动性私募股权 "的定义。【原文：Wall Street is still awaiting regulatory approval for the first full-blown private-asset ETFs, but for now opportunistic issuers are continuing to churn out products that claim to replicate the booming asset class — and stretching the definition of “liquid private equity.”】

item.title: 华尔街回击零日期权的严厉保证金规定
item.description: 全球最大的衍生品清算所提出了一项新的保证金规则，以应对零日期权激增带来的风险。【原文：Wall Street brokers and dealers are pushing back on a new margin rule that the world’s largest derivatives-clearing house has proposed to address the risk from the boom in zero-day options even after some revisions.】

item.title: Pimco 称市场对德国财政改革过度兴奋
item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Bond markets are overexcited about a potential shift to looser fiscal policy in Germany following Sunday’s elections, according to Nicola Mai, sovereign credit analyst at Pacific Investment Management Co.】

item.title: 大型矿商显示大额支付时代已经结束
item.description:
必和必拓（BHP）和力拓（Rio）本周都削减了股息，反映了市场疲软和战略变化。【原文：

BHP and Rio both trimmed dividends this week, reflecting market weakness and strategic changes.

】

item.title: 万科从国家支持者处获得 5.79 亿美元贷款用于偿还债务
item.description: 中国万科集团（China Vanke Co.）获得了政府部门的新一轮财政支持，其最大的国有股东计划出资 42 亿元人民币（5.79 亿美元），帮助这家陷入困境的开发商偿还未偿债务。【原文：China Vanke Co. received another round of financial support from authorities, with its largest state shareholder planning to offer up to 4.2 billion yuan ($579 million) to help the distressed developer repay outstanding debt.】

item.title: 政府就债务问题向投资者作出保证后塞内加尔债券上涨
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，塞内加尔财政和预算部长谢赫-迪巴（Cheikh Diba）在与国际投资者的通话中排除了重组该国债务的可能性。【原文：Senegal’s Finance and Budget Minister Cheikh Diba ruled out a restructuring of the country’s debt in a call with international investors, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 墨西哥经济出现 2021 年以来最大季度跌幅
item.description: 墨西哥的经济出现了自 2021 年以来最大的季度萎缩，国内需求和私人投资萎靡不振，而此时墨西哥与其最大的贸易伙伴之间的紧张关系正在加剧。【原文：Mexico’s economy posted the biggest quarterly contraction since 2021, with domestic demand and private investment faltering just as tensions with its top trade partner mount.】

item.title: 硅谷最受欢迎的床垫可能存在隐私风险
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，埃伦-休特（Ellen Huet）想知道一个与互联网相连的、基于订阅的床铺系统的优点。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Ellen Huet wonders about the merits of an internet-connected, subscription-based bed system.】

item.title: 印度央行将通过外汇掉期注入 100 亿美元资金
item.description: 印度央行将通过外汇互换注入价值 100 亿美元的流动性，以遏制银行系统的现金紧缩。【原文：India’s central bank will inject $10 billion worth of liquidity via a foreign-exchange swap to curb a cash crunch in the banking system.】

item.title: 欧洲粮食新愿景中农民的地位高于气候推动力
item.description: 在地缘政治紧张局势和极端天气事件日益加剧的情况下，欧洲计划更好地保护本国农民免受外国竞争的影响，以此作为保障未来粮食安全努力的一部分。【原文：Europe plans to better protect its farmers from foreign competition, as part of efforts to safeguard future food security amid growing geopolitical tensions and extreme weather events.】

item.title: 硅谷的阅读清单揭示其政治野心
item.description:

item.title: 新加坡将与基金管理公司共同投资 37 亿美元帮助提振本地股票
item.description: 新加坡计划向基金经理投资 50 亿新元（37 亿美元），以帮助提振本地股市，并将开始要求一些家族办公室将其部分资产配置到国内股票中。【原文：Singapore plans to invest S$5 billion ($3.7 billion) with fund managers to help boost the local stock market, and will start requiring some family offices to deploy a portion of their assets into domestic equities.】

item.title: 特朗普削减美国机构经费，令打击虚假信息的互联网监督机构陷入困境
item.description: 曾确认 1 月 6 日国会大厦叛乱参与者身份的互联网监督机构正准备裁员。科索沃的一家媒体初创公司在政治局势分裂的情况下关闭了一档每周一次的节目，该公司的目标是搜寻俄罗斯的虚假信息。在伊朗，隐私权倡导者正在缩减帮助伊斯兰共和国用户自由浏览网络的工作。【原文：An internet watchdog that identified participants in the Jan. 6 Capitol insurrection is preparing to cut staff. A media startup in Kosovo that hunts Russian disinformation has shuttered a weekly show amid a divisive political landscape. Privacy advocates are dialing back work in Iran that helps users in the Islamic Republic browse the web freely.】
